name: Cyber Sale Simulator
description:
It's that time of year again - it's time to grab a great deal on some games you'll probably never play! You've saved up all your pennies from the last sale and you're ready to spend your cash on anything that might fly by, but make sure you grab something good, or else you're just wasting money!

Go! Go! Consumerism!

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Click: EVERYTHING

Credits:

  • Sam Vidler - Art
  • Harrison Short - Programming & Sound
  • David Upcher - Music
  • Go to harrisonshort.net/6in6-challenge/ for additional credits!

Other Notes:

Cyber Sale Simulator was made in one month as part of the 6-in-6 challenge being undertaken by Sam Vidler and Harrison Short. From July through to December 2018, we'll be making (and trying to release) one game a month. To follow our journey, check out our Twitter pages: Sam, Harrison

Known Issues:

  • Steps: Select setting lower than "Ultra" on initial start up window. - Effect: Game greatly drains CPU and GPU.
  • Steps: Unknown. - Effect: Claw grabbed multiple games and made score increase dramatically when it should not have.
